Both the XS/Max and the XR use the same modem, the new Intel XMM7560. But the XR is missing two of the XS/Max's antenna branches, making it a 2x2 MIMO phone versus the XS/Max's 4x4 MIMO.
https://www.pcmag.com/article/364768/exclusive-iphone-xs-crushes-xr-in-cellular-signal-test-resu

replies.msg:
三個鏡頭要程三角形排法先有用，加埋粒閃光燈，就砌成四方形或圓形。
問題只係個四方形擺係中間，或者側邊，
擺中間會好睇啲，但揸機時好容易手指掂到組鏡頭。
比著你，你會點擺？
